summary: This document is an email from Lesley Groff to Amanda Kirby requesting the names of individuals scheduled to visit Jeffrey Epstein. It highlights the organizational aspect of Epstein's itinerary management.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is identified as the assistant to Jeffrey Epstein, requesting information for his itinerary.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the email, being asked to provide names of visitors for Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the itinerary is being prepared, indicating his central role in the correspondence.

connections.description: Lesley Groff is the assistant to Jeffrey Epstein, managing his schedule.
Amanda Kirby is involved in coordinating visits for Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is requesting visitor names for Jeffrey Epstein's itinerary.
The correspondence indicates a structured approach to managing Epstein's appointments.
